Text: I really did want to take a break, but I've grown too dependent on randi & thom for information. I'd probably have withdrawals if I couldn't listen. I figure as long as i'm recording for personal...might as well upload & share.

Thank you, thank you, thank you.

I've been having troubles registering or else I would have commented earlier.

I was devastated to hear you say you weren't going to post these anymore, I just discovered your torrents last month and have become addicted. You are performing such a great service!

Thanks again.
